Uses of Package
com.xhive.security

Packages that use com.xhive.security
com.xhive.core.interfaces This package contains the X-Hive core interfaces, that give access to database (meta-)information, database users and authorities, and control the connection to the database (including transaction control). 
com.xhive.security This package contains the interfaces and classes related to X-Hive/DB's JAAS support. 
 

Classes in com.xhive.security used by com.xhive.core.interfaces
XhiveSecurityConfigIf
          An interface to manipulate the security configuration of the X-Hive/DB server.
 

Classes in com.xhive.security used by com.xhive.security
XhiveNameHandlerIf
          An interface that maps instances of javax.security.auth.Subject to X-Hive/DB user names and (optionally) group names.
XhivePrincipal
          A simple principal that only contains a name.
